articles.title: French Hospitals Ordered to Prepare for Possible War by 2026
articles.summary: French health ministry has issued confidential instructions to hospitals nationwide to prepare for potential 'major military engagement' by March 2026, according to a leaked government letter, raising concerns about escalating European tensions.

articles.title: Global Bond Selloff Intensifies as Gold Hits Record High
articles.summary: Investors are rapidly selling government bonds worldwide while gold prices reach unprecedented levels, indicating growing concerns about global economic stability and geopolitical tensions.

articles.title: China Retaliates with Tariffs on US Fiber-Optic Companies
articles.summary: China has imposed anti-dumping tariffs on American fiber-optic manufacturers following its first anti-circumvention investigation, claiming US companies mislabeled products to avoid existing duties.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Markets shake as global tensions rise.
